text: @premierleague 3 hours ago, the Premier League released a statement saying games will go ahead as scheduled this weekend. 2 hours ago, Arsenal's manager Arteta tested positive for coronavirus. 15 minutes ago, Chelsea's Hudson-Odoi tested positive. Cancel the fucking season. @premierleague
